text: Nothing in §§ 47-2301 to 47-2315 shall be construed as affecting the application to motor vehicles of the personal property tax in force on May 3, 1924, which personal property tax shall continue to be levied, assessed, and collected on motor vehicles.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-2314.

1973 Ed., § 47-1915.

DC CODE § 47-2314

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Personal property tax laws not affected.
